name: Christmas Memory Match
description:
It's easy. Tap to flip two cards. Match a pair and they disappear. But flip quickly ... the clock is ticking. Play in un-timed or time mode and try beating the clock.

A game for kids, but you grown-ups may find yourselves struggling to beat your kids' times in matching all the pairs.

They can choose to play free game meaning there is no timer to distract the litle ones or then can choose time challenge with different difficulty levels. Try to get the highest score in the least amount of time. There is even a highscore view so the kids will soon be competing with eachother to set the fastest time score.

Great for entertaining your kids at restaurants and on airplanes.

This game includes several levels of difficulty. Playing is fun for everyone...INCLUDING Grown Ups!
- Free mode with no timer.
- Easy Mode.
- Medium Mode .
- Hard Mode.
- High score view.
- Cute background music.
- And the best of all there´s no adds!
- No in-app purchase.
